pesticide.PPE: protective eyewear (goggles, face shield, or safety glasses), long-sleeved shirt and long pants, shoes and socks, chemical-resistant gloves (such as natural rubber, selection category A), chemical-resistant apron when mixing or loading, cleaning up spills or equipment, or otherwise exposed to the concentrate

Safety_Information.general_Info: WARNING: Causes substantial but temporary eye injury. Do not get in eyes or on clothing. Harmful if swallowed.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by the poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person. Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor or going for treatment.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: If pesticide gets on skin, wash immediately with soap and water.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Probable mucosal damage may contraindicate the use of gastric lavage.
